query: WITH entities AS (SELECT kyc_verification, email, id FROM core_customers WHERE ((kyc_verification = $1) AND (COALESCE((email, id) > ($4, $3), $3 IS NULL))) ORDER BY email ASC, id ASC LIMIT $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $5 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_customer_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.email asc, i.id asc, i.id, e.sequence
